name: Fear in the Dark
description:
Are you afraid of the unknown? Do you believe in ghosts lurking in the dark? You will soon find out in this little pixel horror game called "Fear in the dark". Your quest is to keep the candles of the cemetery to remain lit but beware of the evil that dwells in the darkness for you shouldn't become another soul lost in this nightmare. Can you achieve the high score and engrave your name in history? Come and try...if you dare

V1.0 is totally free of bugs,

Your Welcome
